original_title: Muse: Live at Fuji Rock Festival 2015
overview: Part of the Drones Festivals Tour 2015. Muse were headlining the festival alongside Foo Fighters, Noel Gallagher's High Flying Birds, FKA Twigs, Belle & Sebastian and Royal Blood.  Performed: 25th July 2015
title: Muse: Live at Fuji Rock Festival 2015
